QuestData.Title: Thieving Raiders
QuestData.Description: Saurok!$b$bThese vile creatures are obsessed with killing and stealing. They attacked our settlement without provocation or warning.$b$bPlease, $c, can you aid us?$b$bHelp us recover our lost possessions from these Riverblade raiders that march along the river and we will gladly reward you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 5 pieces of Pillaged Jinyu Loot.
QuestData.CompletionText: I think they even stole my holy spittoon.
QuestData.RewardText: Not many would stop to help a village in need... especially so deep in the wilds.$b$bYou are a champion to our people, $p.
